title: Will the lil devil teemo icon come back?
body: So .. when doom bots last year came  , my laptop was broken and had no other source of getting to play Doom Bots of Doom , The lil devil icon is something i really frickin want and im even willing spending rp to get it , anyone knows if it's coming back with the new doom bots of doom or any way to aquire it at the time? (or if its ocming back anytime soon)

replies.body:
That's fricking sucks.. i had 14000 ip to change my name to Lil Devil Teemo (or somethin similar if taken)
ready to buy the lil devil skin and wear the icon.. 

dreams dont come true


{{sticker:sg-ahri-1}}

[Rotating game modes](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210354503-Rotating-Game-Modes-FAQ) aren't the same as their initial events, so I don't believe rewards or special icons will be tied to this one.  Similar to Ascension, the first event had participation rewards, but are no longer included once it rolls out to weekend rotating game modes.  Sorry about that!
